pages.text: Bringing out the artist in ever player. World coloring allows the player to dye blocks simply by right clicking with any of the 16 normal colors in #forge/dyes. Can be enabled/disabled in the config.
The blocks that are affected are: $(li)Wool $(li)Mineral Wool $(li)Terracotta $(li)Glazed Terracotta $(li)Stained Glass $(li)Stained Glass Panes $(li)Concrete Powder $(li)Concrete $(li)LEDs
